title: Auto Movie Tagger
description: A small python script that auto tags movie files. It fetches movie information and poster from imdb and tmdb.

title: moviedb
description: A simple web app written using python flask framework. A user can search for movies and also add them to their favorites list.

title: dotfiles
description: These are just my linux config files that I use on my Arch Linux machine. I just wanted to fill this space a little xD.
